text: in the provincial City of Lake High
Haiti an unusual courtroom drama is
unfolding on stage the government is
trying these 13 police and prison
officials with murder or attempted
murder in connection with the prison
massacre here last year testifying
against them our prison inmates who
witnessed the shooting or were shot
themselves are you positive you two of
you alone somewhat a fantasy about the
game consists fusion into many hundreds
of local residents crammed into a public
theater to watch the proceedings and the
decorum is purely Haitian defense
attorneys shout insults the judge
observers cheer as though at a soccer
game rum and beer are sold at a bar near
the door and yet despite its quirks the
prosecution of these police officers
signals an important step in Hades
effort to build a credible justice
system a system notorious for locking up
people for months or years without trial
and for letting serious crimes go
unpunished Hades new justice minister
